nodes.bodyText: I do not quite get the meaning of the second sentence. Can you try to rephrase it?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -85,7 +87,8 @@ private Command(
      *
      * @param message The message containing the command.
      * @param tenantId The tenant that the device belongs to.
-     * @param deviceId The identifier of the device.
+     * @param deviceId The identifier of the device that the command will be sent to. This could be a mapped gateway,
+     *                 the original command target device is given in the message address in that case.

@@ -85,7 +87,8 @@ private Command(
      *
      * @param message The message containing the command.
      * @param tenantId The tenant that the device belongs to.
-     * @param deviceId The identifier of the device.
+     * @param deviceId The identifier of the device that the command will be sent to. This could be a mapped gateway,
+     *                 the original command target device is given in the message address in that case.
